name: Toolify
headline: Build internal tools with AI
description:
Toolify is dev-first internal tooling. At some point, companies using low-code builders hit a brick wall, and are bogged down by their limitations rather quickly.

We offer:
- A starter kit with sensible defaults,
- A VSCode extension which has AI that creates the internal tool for you, end to end, and,
- A web app where you can deploy your tools.

This gives you the best of both worlds -- everything you need to build tools just as fast as low-code, and an escape hatch when you need it.

founders.name: Rohan Mayya, Founder
founders.description: Previously built generative AI apps (like God In A Box and AlphaCTR) that got nearly 1m sign ups, and before that worked remote as an engineer at an early stage startup in Seattle.

founders.name: Saifur Rahman, Founder
founders.description: Co-founder of Creo, a framework for building internal tools. Former engineer at Endurance International Group, where I worked on domain name registration systems.

![](https://toolify.sh/yc-logo.png)Backed by Y Combinator
# Dev-first internal tooling
Rapidly build customizable internal tools, admin panels, and dashboards with our NextJS based framework.
[Get started](https://toolify.sh/<https:/app.toolify.sh>)[Book a demo](https://toolify.sh/<https:/cal.com/rohan-mayya/15min>)
Internal ToolsAdmin Dashboards
![Support Tool](https://toolify.sh/_next/image?url=%2Fhero-images%2Fnice-tool-1.png&w=3840&q=75)
## Choices that will delight your team
A good set of abstractions with an escape hatch
### Ready to use components
Off the shelf components that will cover all your possible CRUD use cases
![Components](https://toolify.sh/components.png)
### Build with AI
An AI agent that builds and debugs your tool for you, as a VSCode extension
![VSCode Extension](https://toolify.sh/vsce_light.png)
### Quickstart CLI
Get started in seconds with our CLI
![CLI](https://toolify.sh/cli.png)
### Effortless Deployments
Automatic deployments with every push, once you connect your repo

### Precise Access Control
Assign a role to every user, and control what tools they have access to
![Permissions](https://toolify.sh/perm.png)
### Code-first
Have full control over your code, never get locked in to proprietary low-code tools
![Code image](https://toolify.sh/codeimage-snippet.png)
### Integrations for your data
Bring in your own data source and we'll help you connect, write and test your queries
![SVG](https://toolify.sh/icons/postgres.svg)![SVG](https://toolify.sh/icons/firebase.svg)![SVG](https://toolify.sh/icons/mongodb.svg)![SVG](https://toolify.sh/icons/dynamodb.svg)
## What you get out of the box
Clean UX and sensible defaults
## Authentication
Seamless authentication for your organization, whichever way they want
## Team Permissions
Granular permissions for the tools used by your team, managed with a simple interface
## Audit Logs
See who ran which tool and when, with detailed logs
## Beautiful Component Library
Myriad of UI components to quickly scaffold your tools
## Seamless deployments
Deploy your tools with a single command, and scale effortlessly
## Source control
Easy to manage your tools, since they're just plain text files
## Ready to build your tools?
### Use Toolify today
[Get started](https://toolify.sh/<https:/app.toolify.sh>)[Book a demo](https://toolify.sh/<https:/cal.com/rohan-mayya/15min>)
[![twitter](https://toolify.sh/toolify-full.png)Toolify](https://toolify.sh/</>)

generated_description:
**Toolify** is a company on a mission to transform the way organizations build internal tools using AI. They recognized the challenges developers face with traditional low-code platforms, which often lead to limitations and frustrations. Instead of forcing developers into rigid frameworks, Toolify offers a developer-first approach that combines speed and flexibility.

Founded in 2023 and part of Y Combinator's Batch W24, Toolify is based in Bengaluru, India, and boasts a compact team of two. Their offerings include:

- **A Starter Kit** with sensible defaults to get you quickly up and running.
- **A VSCode Extension** that utilizes AI to automatically create internal tools from scratch, managing the entire process from start to finish.
- **A Web App** where you can effortlessly deploy your tools.

This combination empowers teams to build customizable tools as fast as they would with low-code options, but with the added benefit of complete code control. If you need a way out of the typical low-code constraints, Toolify provides an escape hatch that lets you dive deeper into your code whenever you choose.

Key features include:

- **Ready-to-use Components** for all your CRUD needs.
- **Quickstart CLI** for instant setup.
- **Effortless Deployments** that integrate with your version control, ensuring every push effortlessly goes live.
- **Precise Access Control** and **Team Permissions**, so your tools are secure and tailored to your organization.
- **Audit Logs** for tracking actions taken on your tools.
- Seamless integration with various data sources like PostgreSQL, Firebase, and MongoDB.

In essence, Toolify presents a great balance: the speed and ease of low-code with the depth and control of custom coding. If you're tired of being shackled by the limitations of other platforms, Toolify is worth a look. You can find more about their offerings on [their website](https://toolify.sh) or engage with their community on Discord.

Whether you want to build internal tools, dashboards, or admin panels, Toolify positions itself as a strong ally for developers seeking to streamline their workflows—without sacrificing control.
